NEU CTF Club https://neu-ctf.club/ Recent content on NEU CTF Club Hugo -- gohugo.io en
Welcome to CTFC! on NEU CTF Club https://neu-ctf.club/ Recent content in Welcome to CTFC! on NEU CTF Club Hugo -- gohugo.io en Sun, 17 Nov 2024 00:00:00 +0000
CTF Thyme https://neu-ctf.club/events/fa24_thyme/ Sun, 17 Nov 2024 00:00:00 +0000 https://neu-ctf.club/events/fa24_thyme/ Hi Hackers!! Hungry for more CTFs? Want some real competition experience to put on your resume that employers will eat up? Come join CTF club and NU WiCyS for a friendsgiving feast at CTF Thyme!
GM#5: Operation Offline https://neu-ctf.club/events/fa24_gm5/ Tue, 05 Nov 2024 00:00:00 +0000 https://neu-ctf.club/events/fa24_gm5/ Hi Hackers!! Our LAST GM of the whole semester is already here !! Plan, coordinate, and execute a bank heist with us- and perhaps win some gift cards if you make it out!
GM#4: Exploit Manor https://neu-ctf.club/events/fa24_gm4/ Tue, 22 Oct 2024 00:00:00 +0000 https://neu-ctf.club/events/fa24_gm4/ Hi Hackers! Looking for a spooky scary time? Want to try your hand at some tricks and get rewarded with treats? Come to our GM to escape a haunted house by solving CTF challenges, and eat lots of candy along the way!
GM#3: Ownlympics https://neu-ctf.club/events/fa24_gm3/ Tue, 08 Oct 2024 00:00:00 +0000 https://neu-ctf.club/events/fa24_gm3/ Hi Hackers!!! Want to get better at CTFs? Want to train your problem solving muscles? Get big and strong for the winter bulk? Come to our next General Meeting to train, then compete in a fun event to win gift cards!
GM#2: Game Night https://neu-ctf.club/events/fa24_gm2/ Tue, 24 Sep 2024 00:00:00 +0000 https://neu-ctf.club/events/fa24_gm2/ I LOVE GAMBLING! If you love gambling — and/or learning about offensive cybersecurity — come to our SECOND general meeting of the year, Game Night! Yes yes yes, there will be challenges … but, for each challenge you solve, you will have the chance to try your luck ;) maybe you’ll win a Starbucks gift card .
Versus CTF https://neu-ctf.club/events/fa24_versus/ Sat, 21 Sep 2024 00:00:00 +0000 https://neu-ctf.club/events/fa24_versus/ GET READY FOR VERSUS CTF with Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute’s Security Club!! Join us SATURDAY, SEPT 21, 12PM in Shillman 220 for free catered food, prizes and surprises, plenty of challenges, and fun teamwork.
GM#1: Wild West https://neu-ctf.club/events/fa24_gm1/ Fri, 06 Sep 2024 00:00:00 +0000 https://neu-ctf.club/events/fa24_gm1/ Hackers, this town ain’t big enough for the two of us. On Tuesday, Sept. 10 at 6pm, we will be giddying up for a new year of CTF! Come prepared with a laptop and your best problem solving skills.
SEATF https://neu-ctf.club/events/sp24_seatf/ Sat, 06 Apr 2024 00:00:00 +0000 https://neu-ctf.club/events/sp24_seatf/ Hi hackers! Join CTF Club, NU WiCyS, and NU Security for the sequel to the fall’s SUB-Z3R0: SeaTF! This CTF is open to any and all interested undergraduate students, regardless of experience!
GM#6: Bunny Bounty https://neu-ctf.club/events/sp24_gm6/ Wed, 27 Mar 2024 00:00:00 +0000 https://neu-ctf.club/events/sp24_gm6/ Hi hackers! Join us NEXT WEDNESDAY as we fight to the death for the easter bunny’s delightful children…. I mean challenges. There’s lots of hidden challenges and flags waiting for you to crack open.
GM#5: Ghidra Guidance https://neu-ctf.club/events/sp24_gm5/ Wed, 13 Mar 2024 00:00:00 +0000 https://neu-ctf.club/events/sp24_gm5/ Hi hackers! Join CTFC x WiCyS THIS WEDNESDAY as we hone in on Ghidra and its elite capabilities. Developed by the NSA and released as an open-source software, Ghidra has broken down barriers to entry in the field of reverse engineering.
GM#4: Osint Odyssey https://neu-ctf.club/events/sp24_gm4/ Wed, 21 Feb 2024 00:00:00 +0000 https://neu-ctf.club/events/sp24_gm4/ hi hackers! Join us as we use our ultimate stalking… I mean investigation skills with the OSINT framework. We’ll go over some tried and true strategies for information-gathering. In today’s data-driven world, knowledge truly is power.
GM#3: P.S. I Love CTFs https://neu-ctf.club/events/sp24_gm3/ Mon, 05 Feb 2024 00:00:00 +0000 https://neu-ctf.club/events/sp24_gm3/ Hi hackers! with Valentine’s Day around the corner, the CTF Club would like to invite you to our P.S. I Love You… I meant CTFs event next week on Feb.
GM#2: Crypto Trail https://neu-ctf.club/events/sp24_gm2/ Sun, 21 Jan 2024 00:00:00 +0000 https://neu-ctf.club/events/sp24_gm2/ Hey hackers! Get ready for an EXCITING ADVENTURE this upcoming Monday! Join us for ROUND 2 of our thrilling treasure hunt where you’ll follow a trail of cryptic challenges leading to a DELICIOUS, MYSTERIOUS prizes… oooo ahhhh… Trust, this event is a fan favorite!
Month[0] CTF https://neu-ctf.club/events/sp24_month0/ Tue, 02 Jan 2024 00:00:00 +0000 https://neu-ctf.club/events/sp24_month0/ Our first CTF Competition of the semester will be January 31st! Come celebrate completing the first month of 2024 with us by solving challenges and possibly winning Amazon gift cards!
GM#1: Murder, Mystery, & CTFs https://neu-ctf.club/events/sp24_gm1/ Mon, 01 Jan 2024 00:00:00 +0000 https://neu-ctf.club/events/sp24_gm1/ Hi hackers! We’re back and better than ever! Join us this Wednesday 1/10 for a Clue inspired murder mystery challenge. We need your help in catching the killer here on NEU’s campus.
Sub-Z3r0 CTF https://neu-ctf.club/events/2023_subzero/ Sat, 02 Dec 2023 00:00:00 +0000 https://neu-ctf.club/events/2023_subzero/ NU Security, NU WiCYS and NU CTF are so excited to announce the biggest student-led security event at Northeastern! We present to you: The SUB-Z3R0 CTF! This CTF is open to all undergraduate students who are interested, regardless of their experience level.
GM #8 Wireshark Pt. 2 https://neu-ctf.club/events/2023_gm8/ Wed, 15 Nov 2023 00:00:00 +0000 https://neu-ctf.club/events/2023_gm8/ Let’s get our hands deep into Wireshark – your “gateway” to understanding the intricacies of digital communication and much more. This is an advanced workshop but any and all questions are welcome!
GM #7: Kali Connect https://neu-ctf.club/events/2023_gm7/ Thu, 09 Nov 2023 00:00:00 +0000 https://neu-ctf.club/events/2023_gm7/ Kali Linux, the de facto offensive security distribution, is a must-have for cybersecurity enthusiasts and we’re bringing it to you! Don’t worry about downloading anything beforehand, just bring yourself and your computer and we will take care of the rest.
GM #6: Tricks and Treats https://neu-ctf.club/events/2023_gm6/ Thu, 02 Nov 2023 00:00:00 +0000 https://neu-ctf.club/events/2023_gm6/ We are nearing the end of Cybersecurity Awareness Month, that means we gotta finish strong! We had members saying the last CTF was too easy so we had to kick it up a notch.
Sp00ky Scary CTF https://neu-ctf.club/events/2023_spooky/ Thu, 26 Oct 2023 00:00:00 +0000 https://neu-ctf.club/events/2023_spooky/ Get ready for a spooktacular challenge! It is Cybersecurity Awareness Month, this means more challenges to break into! What’s in store for you: Creepy cryptographic puzzles Haunted digital mazes Witchy riddles to solve Frighteningly fun challenges Prizes await the top 3 rankers, so assemble your team (max of 3) or go solo, and let the cryptic adventure begin!
GM #5: Burp Suite Bash https://neu-ctf.club/events/2023_gm5/ Thu, 19 Oct 2023 00:00:00 +0000 https://neu-ctf.club/events/2023_gm5/ Want to learn how to use this web pentesting tool and immediately apply your skills to solve CTF challenges? Come join us at our next GM with Burp Suite Community Edition installed!
GM#4: Around the World https://neu-ctf.club/events/2023_gm4/ Thu, 12 Oct 2023 00:00:00 +0000 https://neu-ctf.club/events/2023_gm4/ Come explore a variety of CTF topics ranging from steganography to web exploitation and much more. This meeting is dedicated for you all to strengthen your weakest areas of expertise and sharpen your CTF experience through reinforcement.
GM #3: Cryptotrail https://neu-ctf.club/events/2023_gm3/ Thu, 05 Oct 2023 00:00:00 +0000 https://neu-ctf.club/events/2023_gm3/ Happy Cybersecurity Awareness Month hackers! This means more challenges to conquer! Buckle up for this upcoming GM, whether you’ll be tackling it individually or via teams, you will be going head-to-head in a treasure hunt.
GM #2: Walkthrough https://neu-ctf.club/events/2023_gm2/ Thu, 28 Sep 2023 00:00:00 +0000 https://neu-ctf.club/events/2023_gm2/ This week we’ll be going over the challenges you loved from our Kickoff CTF competition. Bring all your burning questions and hopefully get inspired!
Kickoff CTF Competition https://neu-ctf.club/events/2023_kickoff/ Thu, 21 Sep 2023 00:00:00 +0000 https://neu-ctf.club/events/2023_kickoff/ Thank you all for participating in our first ever CTF competition— it was special for us to see you all wracking your brain and enjoying the challenges we made.
